name: Running away is hard
description:
Submission for the Fear Jam 8, theme: Haphephobia

With this game we wanted to create a mix between a plateformer and an 

auto-scroller . You must avoid to touch or be touched by any monster : 

the one behind you and the ones on your way.


Commands : 
Left key to slow
Right key to speed 
Space to jump
Eyes to cry (lol)

Music and art : EvilDuckk
Programming: Moustikouille
